languages.text: "Ты недостаточно долго прожила среди людей, раз считаешь, что угрозы еще больше расположат меня к тебе. Решение за вами, Вольный Торговец, но уверяю — я усыплю вашего карманного ксеноса при первом же признаке его неповиновения".

"You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favourably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."
languages.original_text: "Ты недостаточно долго прожила среди людей, раз считаешь, что угрозы еще больше расположат меня к тебе. Решение за вами, Вольный Торговец, но уверяю — я усыплю вашего карманного ксеноса при первом же признаке его неповиновения".

traits.locale_text: "You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favorably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

"You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favorably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

"You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favorably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

"You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favourably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

languages.text: “如果你以为威胁我就会让我对你更有好感的话，那我只能说，你在人类之中呆得还不够久。决定权在你手里，行商浪人，但我得把话说明白：只要你的异形宠物有一丁点不服从的迹象，我就会把她消灭。”
languages.original_text: "You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favourably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

traits.locale_text: “如果你以为威胁我就会让我对你更有好感的话，那我只能说，你在人类之中呆得还不够久。决定权在你手里，行商浪人，但我得把话说明白：只要你的异形宠物有一丁点不服从的迹象，我就会把她消灭。”

languages.text: «Aún no has pasado tiempo suficiente entre humanos si crees que las amenazas me harán tratarte mejor. La decisión es suya, Comerciante, pero seré franco: exterminaré a su xenos mascota en cuanto muestre la menor señal de rebeldía».
languages.original_text: "You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favourably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

traits.locale_text: «Aún no has pasado tiempo suficiente entre humanos si crees que las amenazas me harán tratarte mejor. La decisión es suya, Comerciante, pero seré franco: exterminaré a su xenos mascota en cuanto muestre la menor señal de rebeldía».

languages.text: 「もし脅しで我がお前に好意的になると思うなら、人間と過ごす時間がまだ足りていないようだな。決定はあなた次第です、自由開拓者。ですが、はっきりと言わせていただこう。不服従の兆候が見られた時点で、我は即座にあなたの贔屓にしている異種族を処刑する」
languages.original_text: "You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favourably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

traits.locale_text: 「もし脅しで我がお前に好意的になると思うなら、人間と過ごす時間がまだ足りていないようだな。決定はあなた次第です、自由開拓者。ですが、はっきりと言わせていただこう。不服従の兆候が見られた時点で、我は即座にあなたの贔屓にしている異種族を処刑する」

languages.text: "Ihr wart noch nicht lange genug unter Menschen, wenn Ihr glaubt, dass Drohungen meinen Eindruck von Euch verbessern. Es ist Eure Entscheidung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, aber eines muss Euch klar sein – ich werde Euer Xenos-Haustier beim ersten Anzeichen von Ungehorsam auslöschen."
languages.original_text: "You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favourably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart noch nicht lange genug unter Menschen, wenn Ihr glaubt, dass Drohungen meinen Eindruck von Euch verbessern. Es ist Eure Entscheidung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, aber eines muss Euch klar sein – ich werde Euer Xenos-Haustier beim ersten Anzeichen von Ungehorsam auslöschen."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas passé suffisamment de temps parmi les humains si vous pensez gagner mon approbation en me menaçant. La décision vous appartient, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais que les choses soient claires : j'éliminerai votre xénos de compagnie au premier signe de désobéissance. »
languages.original_text: "You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favourably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas passé suffisamment de temps parmi les humains si vous pensez gagner mon approbation en me menaçant. La décision vous appartient, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais que les choses soient claires : j'éliminerai votre xénos de compagnie au premier signe de désobéissance. »

languages.original_text: "You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favourably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

languages.text: "Tehditlerin sana karşı daha ılımlı yaklaşmama neden olacağını sanıyorsan insanlarla yeterince zaman geçirmemişsin demektir. Karar senin Hür Tacir fakat açık konuşayım: En ufak itaatsizliğinde bu evcil zenonu yok ederim."
languages.original_text: "You have not yet spent enough time among humans if you think threats will dispose me more favourably toward you. The decision is yours, Rogue Trader, but let me be clear — I will terminate your pet xenos at the first sign of her noncompliance."

traits.locale_text: "Tehditlerin sana karşı daha ılımlı yaklaşmama neden olacağını sanıyorsan insanlarla yeterince zaman geçirmemişsin demektir. Karar senin Hür Tacir fakat açık konuşayım: En ufak itaatsizliğinde bu evcil zenonu yok ederim."
